bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'DefaultButtonCostMedium'; trainingType == 2 ? {priceInfo: goldTrainingHirePriceData.prices[0], _showDiscountTag: true, _enabled: (accountResourceInfo.gold >= goldTrainingHirePriceData.prices[0].finalPrice), _label: trainIDS} : trainingType == 1 ? {priceInfo: moneyTrainingHirePriceData.prices[0], _showDiscountTag: true, _enabled: (accountResourceInfo.credits >= moneyTrainingHirePriceData.prices[0].finalPrice), _label: trainIDS} : null
